pages.text: A very rare fruit, native to the planet 'First of the Sun', in the Drominad system. It is said that the fruit contains a symbiote that can bond with a human, granting them their companions wondrous abilities.$(br)As this is not that planet, they're very hard to come by, with only the occaisional world hopper bringing them to this world.$(br)It is worth noting that the Fruit of Patji will not effect already tame parrots, rather you have to feed it to a parrot then tame the creature.

pages.name: Wandering Trader
pages.text: For the cost of some emeralds (and a nether star), a wandering trader may be convinced to part with the rare fruit of Patji.
